name: pi-podcast
description: Raspberry Pi-based podcast player with Bluetooth speaker support

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:api: cd api && cross-env PORT=3000 npm run dev:no-bt
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
